PerfectNetExp.abs: untaught 文盲unteach 忘却untempered 没有锻练的
unteach的用法例句1. unteach v. 使忘更多
unteach-untaught-untaught 使忘却(已学过的东西) beseech-besought/beseeched-besought/beseeched 恳求 catch-caught-caught 抓住 speak-spoke-spoken 讲 bespeak-.

list.abs: untamed passions 奔放的激情unteachable 不可教的untempered 未经锻炼的
人、亵慢人、恶人有一个共同的特征:他们不是心里说没有上帝(诗五十三:1),就是狂妄自大,冥顽不灵,行邪恶的事,箴言书把这些人定为不可教(unteachable),无可.
unteachable 不听话的, unteaching 反教, unteachable 固执的

means.word_mean: 1. cause to disbelieve; teach someone the contrary of what he or she had learned earlier

sentences.sentence: "teach somebody to unlearn old habits or methods"

auth_sentence.content: "We've taught them to drink chocolate milk, so we can unteach them that, " Cooper said.
